readable.title: 2061144717_5b3a1864f0
readable.content: A man and child stand at the bottom of an outdoor staircase near benches . A man and young boy are standing , looking at each other , in an outdoor garden area . A man in an ampitheater talking to a boy . A man talks to a boy in a vacant area . The man and the boy are standing at the bottom of the outdoor stairs .
